attributes.action: Not give Margaret Thatcher a state funeral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Because her political achievements, whether you agree with her policies or not, do not warrant such ceremony or expense of tax payers' money.
She remains a contentious figure amongst the British people and giving her a state funeral is unlikely to receive a universal welcome.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
